About Kingdom.Training

Training disciple makers to use media strategically for Disciple Making Movements

Our Vision

Kingdom.Training focuses on practical training for Media to Disciple Making Movements (M2DMM). We are field workers with a heart for the unreached and least-reached peoples of the world, and our passion is to equip disciple makers with strategic media tools that bridge online engagement with face-to-face discipleship.

We operate within what we call the “Heavenly Economy”—a principle that challenges the broken world's teaching that “the more you get, the more you should keep.” Instead, we reflect God's generous nature by offering free training, hands-on coaching, and open-source tools.

Our Mission

Like the men of Issachar who understood the times, we equip disciple makers to use media strategically—identifying spiritual seekers online and connecting them with face-to-face disciplers who help them discover, obey, and share all that Jesus taught.

We wonder what the Church could accomplish with technology God has given to this generation for the first time in history.

How it works

1. Media Content

Targeted content reaches entire people groups through platforms like Facebook and Google Ads. This is the wide end of the funnel, introducing masses of people to the gospel message.

2. Digital Filtering

Trained responders dialogue with seekers online, identifying persons of peace ready for face-to-face engagement. This filters out disinterested individuals and focuses on genuine seekers.

3. Face-to-Face Discipleship

Multipliers meet seekers in person, guiding them through discovery, obedience, and sharing in reproducing communities. This is where true disciple making happens.

Our Foundation

“Of the sons of Issachar, men who understood the times, with knowledge of what Israel should do.”

— 1 Chronicles 12:32

“Go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.”

— Matthew 28:19-20

Kingdom Training

Training disciple makers to use media to accelerate Disciple Making Movements. Equipping practitioners with practical strategies that bridge online engagement with face-to-face discipleship.

Key Definitions

Media to Disciple Making Movements (M2DMM)
A strategic approach that uses targeted media content to identify spiritual seekers online and connect them with face-to-face disciple-makers. The process involves three stages: 1) Media Content - targeted content reaches entire people groups through platforms like Facebook and Google Ads, 2) Digital Filtering - trained responders dialogue with seekers online, identifying persons of peace ready for face-to-face engagement, 3) Face-to-Face Discipleship - multipliers meet seekers in person, guiding them through discovery, obedience, and sharing in reproducing communities.
Disciple Making Movements (DMM)
Reproducing communities of disciples who discover, obey, and share all that Jesus taught, resulting in exponential multiplication of disciples and churches.
Persons of Peace
Individuals who are open to the gospel message and can serve as bridges to their communities, often identified through initial digital conversations.
Heavenly Economy
A principle that challenges the broken world's teaching that "the more you get, the more you should keep." Instead, reflecting God's generous nature by offering free training, hands-on coaching, and open-source tools.
Unreached Peoples
People groups where the name of Jesus has never been proclaimed or where there is no indigenous community of believers with adequate numbers and resources to evangelize their own people.
